input.sentences: it was a cold day in december . the snow seemed to be staying for days and days .
the whole city was ready for the snow to go | but the weatherman was already talking about another storm .
the big trucks can through and pushed the snow away . they also added salt to the roads .
but | the weatherman was right ! our storm came and left 3 inches of snow .
we were going to be stuck with this snow for awhile !
output.sentences: It was the first snow of the year.
Jenny was so excited she wanted to walk to work.
The plows were out on the road early.
They had to plow before everyone woke up.
The city looks beautiful covered in snow.
